title: Request for Body Cam Footage of Incident 04/16/2024

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Georgia Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am writing to formally request access to the bodycam footage under the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) related to the arrest of Gloria Woods, also known as GloRilla, on 04/16/2024.

Incident Details for Footage Retrieval:

Date: 04/16/2024
Location: Peachtree Industrial Boulevard and Suwanee Walk Avenue, Gwinnett County, Georgia
Suspect: Gloria Woods (GloRilla), age 24
Incident Summary: The suspect, Gloria Woods, was arrested on DUI and other charges following a traffic stop at approximately 4:00 AM. She was initially stopped for making a U-turn at a solid red light. During the encounter, she acknowledged drinking alcohol and possessing marijuana in her vehicle. She was subjected to sobriety tests, and police noted signs of intoxication. She was arrested on charges including driving under the influence, consuming alcohol in the vehicle, and failure to obey a traffic control device.
I am requesting copies of all body-worn camera footage from officers who:

I request the following:

Bodycam footage from the officers who interacted with Gloria Woods during the arrest.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Harun

title: Request for Body Cam Footage of Incident on June 14, 2023

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

I am writing to formally request access to the bodycam footage under the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) related to the arrest of Julianna, which took place on June 14, 2023, at a housing complex in St. Lucie, Florida.

Incident Details for Footage Retrieval:

Date: June 14, 2023
Location: St. Lucie County, Florida (housing complex pool area)
Suspect: Julianna (full name unknown)
Incident Summary: Julianna was arrested after being accused of engaging in a threesome with two other women in a public pool in front of children. The incident was reported by a concerned mother and witnessed by a property manager who took photographs of the women. Julianna was apprehended by officers from the St. Lucie County Sheriff's Office, and bodycam footage shows her interactions with the officers during her arrest.
I am requesting copies of all body-worn camera footage from officers who:

Interacted with Julianna during her arrest at the housing complex.
Captured the moments of Julianna's questioning, including her refusal to comply and her arguments with the officers.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Harun

title: Request for Body Cam Footage of Incident on 06/20/2024

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Georgia Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am writing to formally request access to the bodycam footage under the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) related to the arrest of Christina Peterson, which took place on 06/20/2024 at the Red Martini Restaurant and Lounge in Atlanta, Georgia.

Incident Details for Footage Retrieval:

Date: 06/20/2024
Location: Red Martini Restaurant and Lounge, Atlanta, Georgia
Suspect: Christina Peterson, 38
Incident Summary: Christina Peterson, a former probate court judge, was arrested after allegedly striking a police officer during an altercation outside the Red Martini Restaurant. She had been drinking and claims to have intervened to assist a woman who was being attacked. The bodycam footage shows Peterson being uncooperative, visibly distressed, and struggling with officers during her arrest. She faces charges of simple battery against a police officer and felony obstruction of law enforcement.
I am requesting copies of all body-worn camera footage from officers who:
Interacted with Christina Peterson during the altercation outside the Red Martini Restaurant and Lounge.
Captured the moments of Peterson's arrest and her subsequent struggle with officers.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Harun

title: Request for Body Cam Footage of Incident on November 25, 2024

communications.subject: Florida Sunshine Law Request: Request for Body Cam Footage of Incident on November 25, 2024
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

I am writing to formally request access to the bodycam footage under the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) related to the arrest of Pamela Monsalve, which took place on November 25, 2024, in Hallandale Beach, Florida.

Incident Details for Footage Retrieval:

Date: November 25, 2024
Location: Hallandale Beach, Florida
Suspect: Pamela Monsalve, 39
Incident Summary: Pamela Monsalve was arrested after being accused of attempting to kidnap a 3-year-old child from a fenced-in yard. She allegedly took the child down the street before putting him back when approached by the child's mother. The police were then called, and Monsalve was later apprehended. In the body cam footage, Monsalve explains her actions, claiming she thought the child was abandoned and trying to help him find his mother.
I am requesting copies of all body-worn camera footage from officers who:
1. Interacted with Pamela Monsalve during her arrest and questioning.
2. Captured the moments of her explanation regarding the incident, including her conversation with the officers.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Harun

title: Request for Body Cam Footage of Incident March 15, 2024

communications.subject: Tennessee Public Records Act Request: Request for Body Cam Footage of Incident March 15, 2024
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Tennessee Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am writing to formally request access to the bodycam footage under the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) related to the arrest of Lauren Maten, which took place on March 15, 2024, at Nashville Airport.

Incident Details for Footage Retrieval:

Date: March 15, 2024
Location: Nashville Airport, Tennessee
Suspect: Lauren Maten, 24
Incident Summary: Lauren Maten, a self-styled spiritual guru, was arrested for public intoxication after failing to pay her bill at the 400 Degrees restaurant at Nashville Airport. She became increasingly agitated and demanded her ID back, which led to a physical altercation with officers. Maten was heard shouting, resisting arrest, and making incoherent statements, including not knowing what state she was in. She was eventually escorted out of the airport and booked at the police station.
I am requesting copies of all body-worn camera footage from officers who:
Interacted with Lauren Maten during the arrest process at the restaurant and later inside the airport.
Captured the moments of Maten resisting arrest, screaming, and arguing with officers during her transport to the police station.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 7 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Harun
